body_html:
No. IronPython will struggle with any C extensions. Though I think there's a work around for numpy and scipy. Does IronPython work on Mono or CoreCLR? My understanding was that TensorFlow won't run on Windows. 

On Fri, Jan 8, 2016 at 5:03 AM -0800, "Eugene" notifications@github.com wrote:

Anyone tried IronPython approach?

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.

No. IronPython will struggle with any C extensions. Though I think there's a work around for numpy and scipy. Does IronPython work on Mono or CoreCLR? My understanding was that TensorFlow won't run on Windows.
